name: BREW Application Resource File
summary: Learn about .BRX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Brew MP SDK replaced BREW as the latest development toolkit for the Brew mobile platform. The Brew MP SDK includes standalone programs as well as plug-ins for Eclipse, Microsoft Visual Studio, and Adobe Flash.
NOTE: BRX files can be updated to the CAR format using the Brew MP SDK.

description: A BRX file is a deprecated application resource file used by older BREW 3.x and 4.x mobile application development programs. It contains descriptions of assets used by the application. The BRX format was replaced by the newer .CAR format.
